about_the_game:
You play as a nerdy guy, a little brave, a little cowardly, but going through life in a fair way. Once in a dangerous situation, you do what you think is right … as a result, you find yourself in a far, far away galaxy. Will you be able to survive and find happiness in this new world for yourself, or will you perish ingloriously, everything will depend on you.

Throughout the game, you will embark on captivating romantic adventures. Choose a girl who captures your heart or conquer the hearts of all the girls, creating a harem. Indulge in thrilling romantic encounters, engage in deep conversations, and make meaningful choices that shape your relationships. The path to love and romance awaits you in this immersive gaming experience.

content_descriptors.notes:
This game contains adult content and is not suitable for players of all ages. The content includes erotica, explicit language, alcohol, drugs, sex, and mild forms of violence.
In the game you will participate in the following scenes: forced sex in a mild form(your character can be forced to have sex by other girls who have a male sexual organ), sex scene woman / man (where your character will be in the role of a girl), sex scene man woman (vanilla scene where you will be in the role of an alpha male).
The game contains scenes of drinking lightly alcoholic drinks (cocktails).
There are scenes in the game where there is a hint that a drug was used that causes clouding of consciousness.
The game has light fight scenes, after receiving a blow, opponents fall unconscious.
The game has scenes of killing your main character when you lose. Also, some minor characters may die during the development of the plot.

detailed_description:
You play as a nerdy guy, a little brave, a little cowardly, but going through life in a fair way. Once in a dangerous situation, you do what you think is right … as a result, you find yourself in a far, far away galaxy. Will you be able to survive and find happiness in this new world for yourself, or will you perish ingloriously, everything will depend on you.

Throughout the game, you will embark on captivating romantic adventures. Choose a girl who captures your heart or conquer the hearts of all the girls, creating a harem. Indulge in thrilling romantic encounters, engage in deep conversations, and make meaningful choices that shape your relationships. The path to love and romance awaits you in this immersive gaming experience.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04+ or Kernel 3.x+ based distributions
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.6 10.7 10.8
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Intel Core 2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics Chip
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

name: STAR MARS

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 or DirectX 9.0c compatible
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

short_description: Collect your harem in the space game Star Mars.
